conbody.p: GSA fiscal regulations are in the Budget Administration Handbook (CFO 4251.4), Accounting Classification Handbook (CFO P 4240.1), and Accounting Operationsâ€”Voucher Examination Payment Handbook (CFO P 4252.1).
